verbose_text: At physiological Mg2+ concentrations, NMDA receptor antagonists such as ketamine or memantine have little impact on reconstituted GluN2A- or GluN2B containing receptors in vitro, while their blockade of GluN2C- or GluN2D containing receptors is largely preserved [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: NMDA receptor antagonists such as ketamine or memantine
